mapper.update:
update tbl_invoice
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
danjuriqi = #{danjuriqi,jdbcType=CHAR},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
shenpiren = #{shenpiren,jdbcType=CHAR},
djbianma = #{djbianma,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sqbumen = #{sqbumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contractname = #{contractname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoicetype = #{invoicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
custom = #{custom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
kaihuhang = #{kaihuhang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kaihuID = #{kaihuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qyshuihao = #{qyshuihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baogaoname = #{baogaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
earn = #{earn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoicemoney = #{invoicemoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shuilv = #{shuilv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shuie = #{shuie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wushuimoney = #{wushuimoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_invoice set organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, danjuriqi = #{danjuriqi,jdbcType=CHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, shenpiren = #{shenpiren,jdbcType=CHAR}, djbianma = #{djbianma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sqbumen = #{sqbumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractname = #{contractname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoicetype = #{invoicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, custom = #{custom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, kaihuhang = #{kaihuhang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kaihuID = #{kaihuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qyshuihao = #{qyshuihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adress = #{adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baogaoname = #{baogaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, earn = #{earn,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, invoicemoney = #{invoicemoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shuilv = #{shuilv,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shuie = #{shuie,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, wushuimoney = #{wushuimoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select i.id,i.organization,i.danjuriqi,i.owner,i.shenpiren,i.djbianma,i.sqbumen,i.contractname,i.invoicetype,a.name as name,i.custom,i.start_date,i.end_date,i.kaihuhang,i.kaihuID,i.qyshuihao,i.adress,i.phone,i.context, i.baogaoname,i.earn,i.invoicemoney,i.shuilv,i.shuie,i.wushuimoney from tbl_invoice i join tbl_activity a on i.name=a.id left join tbl_activity a1 on i.name=a1.id
-- join tbl_activity a1 on i.name=a1.name limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
select count(*) as totalRows from tbl_invoice

from tbl_invoice
